am_hal_i2s_fsync_pulse_t Struct Reference
mcu » apollo330P » I2S - Inter-IC Sound

Structure to configure the pulse of the frame sync signal. More...

Detailed Description

Structure to configure the pulse of the frame sync signal.

If the frame sync signal is active high, the pulse width of the frame sync signal is equal to the duration of its active high level. If the frame sync signal is active low, the pulse width of the frame sync signal is equal to the duration of its active low level.

#include <am_hal_i2s.h>

Data Fields

am_hal_i2s_fsync_pulse_type_e eFsyncPulseType
 The pulse type of the frame sync signal.

am_hal_i2s_fsync_pulse_type_e am_hal_i2s_fsync_pulse_t::eFsyncPulseType

The pulse type of the frame sync signal.

◆ ui32FsyncPulseWidth

uint32_t am_hal_i2s_fsync_pulse_t::ui32FsyncPulseWidth

The pulse width of the frame sync signal in units of sclks. If the pulse type isn't AM_HAL_I2S_FSYNC_PULSE_CUSTOM, this value won't be used.
